title: I feel depressed ( zz'rot portal feedback )

replies.body: It is coded as a structure now. And I believe they changed it because you could do this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tpDS5SjBjPw]
No that's when they disabled it. That's AFKing bug.

I started enjoying 5v5s again when {{item:3512}} was introduced patch 5.1 since you are at least less oppressed by the ADCs.

Don't have to play assassins or OP mages {{champion:134}} {{champion:7}}  to deal with them.

Guess I'll go back to my 3v3 hole where jungling is made more difficult ( {{item:3706}} ) even though the dominant gay strategy there is duo lanes.

... I am hating the new patches....
The portals are fun to play with, its a shame I don't like playing normals that often. I wonder why they don't try to balance it so the spawns are equal in damage and defence to eachother.
